TopicTitle: Astronomer's Interstellar V3 Visual Pack + Real Solar System

Articles.Content:
Hi guys!!! Hope everything's great!

I wanted to ask if anyone is using Astronomer's Interstellar Visual Pack V3 with Real Solar System? This used to work in previous versions of RSS but I think now with the planet's name change it stopped generating clouds and effects on the rest of the solar system (Earth works just fine).

If anyone could shed some light on this I would immensely appreciate it!!!

Thanks in advance!

PS: Link to the pack http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/220335-astronomers-visual-pack-interstellar-v2/files/2201704
I don't know about AVP, but if it doesn't work, you can use RSS Visual Enhancements (RVE) which is an adaptation of EVE to RSS (still a WIP though)

I don't know about AVP, but if it doesn't work, you can use RSS Visual Enhancements (RVE) which is an adaptation of EVE to RSS (still a WIP though)

thanks Gaarst!!!! yeah, I was using RVE back in 0.90 but now it is a WIP and I couldn't get it going, that's why I tried with Astronomer's pack

think I got it though.. it's just a matter of changing the names of the Astronomer's CFG's to match those in RSS
